author: metachris_
content: Iirc bloxroute is a builder+relay combination

author: jgm
content: Okay, so we have no relays that aren't themselves block builders?

author: sky.cactus
content: I don't think flashbots *operates* a builder, they just *author* a builder as a starting point for would-be builders to use.

author: sky.cactus
content: I could be wrong on this, and we have no way to actually prove that they *don't* moonlight as a builder operator.

author: sky.cactus
content: Bloxroute *used* to be only in the relay game I thought, though it is certainly possible they expanded into the builder game more recently.

author: bertcmiller
content: There are a few parties that want to run builders that haven't expressed an intention to run a relay as well

author: bertcmiller
content: see this github issue for some color: https://github.com/flashbots/mev-boost/issues/145
